content:
"The Last Mrs. Parrish" is a fantastic choice. I think you'll really enjoy it.

As for Libby, it's definitely possible to find "The Last Mrs. Parrish" as an e-book through your library. Libby is a great app that allows you to borrow e-books and audiobooks from your local library or school, and it's available on both iOS and Android devices.

To check if "The Last Mrs. Parrish" is available on Libby, follow these steps:

1. Open the Libby app and sign in with your library card or student ID.
2. Tap on the "Search" icon (magnifying glass) at the bottom of the screen.
3. Type "The Last Mrs. Parrish" in the search bar.
4. If the book is available, you'll see it in the search results. You can then tap on the book to see its details, including the availability of the e-book.
5. If the e-book is available, you can borrow it and download it to your device.

If the book is not available, you can also try searching for it on OverDrive, which is the digital library platform that Libby uses. You can also request that your library purchase the e-book if it's not currently available.

Fingers crossed that you'll be able to find it on Libby!
